verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents, of David.) Behold, <S%H2009><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> and how <S%H4100><s%> pleasant <S%H5273><s%> it is For brothers <S%H251><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in unity! <S%H3162><s%>

It is like the precious <S%H2896><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> upon the head, <S%H7218><s%> Coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> upon the beard, <S%H2206><s%> [Even] Aaron's beard, <S%H2206><s%> Coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> upon the edge <S%H6310><s%> of his robes. <S%H4060><s%>

It is like the dew <S%H2919><s%> of Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> Coming <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> For there <S%H8033><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%> â€“ life <S%H9132><s%> forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
